summary: Kristof, an eccentric rich kid, tricks his high school friends into getting back together for a reunion of sorts, under the pretense of a funeral. The group of twenty-somethings is forced ... See full summary »
cast: Patrick Flood|Jeff Peterson|Sam Page|Kim Ryan|Alicia Arden|Michael Guerin|Debra Mayer|Claudiu Trandafir|Constantin Barbulescu|Mac Fyfe
title: Prison of the Dead
